flashcards.notes: Common question asking about location of placed item. Uses 'ha' (where) with past tense 'mĩiga' (put/placed)

flashcards.kikuyu: Nũũ wainaga ndaci ici, na ciainagwo atia?
flashcards.english: Who danced these dances, and how were they danced?
flashcards.notes: Question about traditional dance practices - cultural inquiry using 'Nũũ' (who) and 'atia' (how). Context: asking about 8 traditional Kikuyu dances (Gĩtiiro, Nguchu, Nduumo, etc.)
